data.name: WillWalker
data.short_description: WillWalker is a frenetic shooter set in a cyberpunk metropolis. Fight to overthrow crime by mastering the mysteries of time.
data.about_the_game:
WillWalker is a shooter game set in a cyberpunk universe, where time is your life and you have to kill enemies in order to advance in the game and achieve the objectives. Dive into more than 20 challenging missions which take you through the city and its surroundings, annihilating rival mobs and those who don't want you to succeed.
_x000D_ Kill all the enemies, avenge the death of your family and become the next Capo of the city by conquering all of its areas.
_x000D_ The time is gold. Do not waste it.
_x000D_
_x000D_ MAIN FEATURES
_x000D_ Discover and play with 4 unique characters.
_x000D_ Upgrade each character to unlock special attacks and weapon upgrades.
_x000D_ Kill your enemies and avenge the death of your family.
_x000D_ Face the police and gangs to become the new boss of the city.
_x000D_ Try to get the best time in each level to get better rewards.

Welcome to You are Kaiju. This game involves you the player rampaging through cities and causing chaos. Breath fire and fire plasma beams from your hands. Try to get the highest score through the levels.

data.name: Valley of Dragons
data.short_description: In Valley of Dragons, be prepared to raise and care for your own personal dragon!
data.about_the_game: Love dragons? Want to raise a dragon of your own? Valley of Dragons is a VR game where you raise up your own personal dragon from an egg to an adult through feeding,  petting, and playing with your dragon. Along the way, be prepared to teach it how to hunt, fly, and defend itself!

data.name: DataJack
data.short_description: Take contracts from sinister megacorporations in this isometric stealth action shooter with RPG elements. Choose your approach: hack defenses, take down the guards, or blow a new entrance with explosives. Use your credits to buy weapons, cyberlimbs, hack software, and ninja gear.
data.about_the_game:
DataJack is a 2D isometric stealth action shooter originally released in 2013. In the not-too-distant future, governments have dissolved and powerful mega-corporations wage covert wars for territory and the control of information. As a freelance mercenary, you will conduct sabotage, assassinations, espionage and ambushes on their behalf to earn a living.

30+ nonlinear stealth action missions

Do missions on behalf of three separate factions to earn credits. Your reputation will grow from being a simple goon for hire knocking off fast food restaurants, to a highly-paid corporate assassin infiltrating high-security laboratories and office buildings.

Open-ended gameplay

Before you go weapons hot, consider scouting the location for cameras, gun turrets, guard patrols, and computers of interest.
Plan your approach. Hack the locked doors. Hack the network and steal some valuable data and disable the cameras.

Sneak up behind the guard and take them out before they can alert the others. Sabotage the alarm system. Trigger your remote charge to explode the generator for an instant lights-out, or cover your tracks with smoke grenades.

A successful mission combines careful planning with skilled improvisation when things go wrong. Of course, it may be best to take a loud approach and dominate the enemy with overwhelming firepower before they have a chance to react.

Destructible terrain

All walls and obstacles are fully destructible, if you remembered to bring the heavy ordinance.
You can open new entrances, or set up emergency exits. Just watch out if the robot chasing you is armed with a rocket launcher!

29+ weapons

From submachine guns to shotguns, sniper rifles to rocket launchers, everything you need to conduct urban wetworks can be found at the local black market arms trade.
Choose from an array of primary and secondary weapons and then fine-tune their stats for stealth, accuracy, or stopping power by purchasing unique weapon modifications.

Round out your kit with EMP grenades, field health kits, IR sensing goggles, ninja equipment, and various other military surplus.

Cybernetic upgrade system

Use your credits to upgrade your arms, legs, eyes, and torso for bonuses to combat, speed, and stealth. Pay the street doc to heal your numerous wounds between missions. With augmented eyes, you can see laser tripwires before setting them off, while augmented legs may give you the drop on your unsuspecting enemy.

data.name: World Senate
data.short_description: 세계 상원 는 자신 만의 가상 생활을 할 수있는 온라인 브라우저 게임입니다. 당신은 국가에 가입하고, 차량, 물건, 부동산을 구입하고, 정당을 열고, 국가 대통령이나 상원 의원이 될 수 있으며 다른 많은 활동을 할 수 있습니다.
data.categories: 멀티플레이어,MMO,PvP,온라인 PvP,협동,온라인 협동,플랫폼간 멀티플레이어,Steam 도전 과제,앱 내 구매
data.about_the_game:
세계 상원 게임 은 자신 만의 가상 생활을 할 수있는 온라인 멀티 플레이어 게임입니다. 당신은 국가에 가입하고, 차량, 아이템, 재산을 구입하고, 정당을 열고, 전쟁에서 싸우고, 국가 대통령이되고, 세계 상원 의원이되고, 세계 상원 의원이나 대표가되고, 세계 문제에 투표 할 수 있으며 다른 많은 활동을 할 수 있습니다.

세계 상원 게임에 참여하면 시민은 게임에 참여할 때 선택한 선택에 따라 가상 국가 시민권에 할당됩니다. 이러한 각 국가는 실제 국가의 이름을 따서 명명되었습니다. 세계 상원 게임은 시민들이 게임을 할 수있는 게임의 재미와 현실 세계의 결합 된 버전 인 경향이 있으며 누구나 국가 상원 의원 또는 국가 대통령이 될 수 있고 직접 투표에 의해 선택되는 세계 정치의 발자취를 따를 수 있습니다. 다른 시민으로부터. 훈련, 작업, 전쟁, 특수 요원 전투 및 경주 참여는 매일 수행되며 투자 할 시간을 결정합니다.

보고 싶은 변화가 되십시오. 세상은 당신을 필요로합니다!

data.name: Unforgettable You
data.short_description: Unforgettable You is a contemplating platformer game about love.
data.categories: 싱글 플레이어,Steam 도전 과제,컨트롤러 완벽 지원,Steam Cloud
data.about_the_game:
Unforgettable You is a contemplating platformer game about love. The story is told in the voice of a man reminiscing about the past. He remembers meeting the love of his life and all the turmoil that came with it.



The game has light puzzle elements and some skill based parts but mostly the game is very mellow. You wander through different environments that are linked to the story.

Features:
21 distinct levels with different elements
A beautiful silhouette art style (like Limbo)
Fully voiced narrated story (with subtitles)
The game is free!

data.name: Codename Prodigy
data.short_description: A Couch-Play Platform fighter with Traditional fighting game aspects that focuses on using your stage against your opponent, with each character taking advantage of the stages in unique and different ways
data.categories: 멀티플레이어,PvP,스크린 공유 및 분할 PvP,공유/분할 화면,컨트롤러 완벽 지원,Remote Play Together
data.about_the_game:
About Codename Prodigy

Codename Prodigy (CNP) is a mix of traditional and platform fighting games. The game is focused on using the stage against your opponent with stage hazards, health-stealing floors, and destructible walls.

SPECIAL STAGES

Head into an all-out brawl-out with a DIVERSE SET OF STAGES WITH UNIQUE CHARACTERISTICS! Remember that most of these stages damage you by just being on the ground too!! It's almost like the stages are also characters...

DIVERSE CAST OF CHARACTERS

Immerse yourself and use your playstyle in an increasing cast of characters each of who utilize their vastly DIFFERENT GAMEPLAY through their talents to fight

PREPARE YOURSELF WITH TUTORIAL MODE

Learn the ropes and the intricacies of Codename Prodigy's combos, mechanics, and techniques in its EASY-TO-FOLLOW TUTORIALS!

Characters


Mae's your basic character that's made to introduce players to the game. However she is easy to learn, she can even do better when her Water Specials are mastered

Isaac's the perfect zoner, he can alternate between 2 states that also change how his projectiles work. In his normal state his projectile does more damage but less knockback the more it travels, and an Overdrive state where it does the opposite and gives Isaac faster melee moves at the expense of the ground draining his HP faster

Phoebe's gameplay functions like a double edged sword. Using her special she takes more damage, and accumulates that damage in order to release it in her next attack. On the otherhand, should the opponent land their strike first Phoebe also takes some of that accumulated damage

Kylian plays around his daggers that makes the enemy take more damage from the ground the more daggers land on them. The daggers could be stacked up to 3 times, but they eventually all go away after a bit of time

Juliana's passive abilities are all about movement. They allow her to have less cooldown on her dodges, and it allows her to also dodge into a wall in order to bounce back up in the air without going into hitstun

data.name: School For The Friendless
data.short_description: Harold is sent to a school for people with no friends. The teachers observe and then pair them up, making them roommates. What will happen when Harold ends up sharing a room with a girl?
data.about_the_game:
When Harold (or whatever you decide to name him) is sent to a college for people that have no friends, he has no idea what to expect. Not long after arriving, he ends up finding out that the school pairs its students together and when they're together, they're assigned the same room. However, these students don't have to be the same gender and he is high chance of sharing his room with a girl. At this school, he meets three girls that won't leave him alone.
_x000D_
_x000D_ The first one we have is Anima, who likes to cause trouble for others. She's always making things hard on her teachers and even her friends have trouble getting her to behave herself. Next is the weird and mysterious, Scout, who happens to be the most innocent and childlike of the three. She's an obsession with the supernatural and an endless appetite. Finally, there's Vivian, the annoying pervert who doesn't really care who is around when she's being inappropriate. Despite her behavior, she does have a bit of a mature side, which usually surprises others.
_x000D_
_x000D_ All students must take a survey and then their actions will be observed throughout the day. The choices you make will determine who your partner is. Harold may end up with one of the three girls or with someone else entirely. Since there are three girls, there are three main routes, each with three endings. Whether Harold remains as just friends with these girls or something more depends on the choices he makes. Each of the routes can be completed within an hour. With these three girls, Harold will got caught up in all kinds of messes, learning more about them as time goes by. School For The Friendless is a comedic visual novel with multiple endings depending on how you choose to develop Harold's relationships with the girls.

data.name: Bite At The Museum
data.short_description: Play as Tony the baby Tyrannosaurus and rex shop like never before. Tricera-top the scoreboard as you styrac up dino-mite combos! Veloci-rip through 3 unique exhibits! Stego around and ptero down all sorts of displays and cause a giganto mess! Ankylosaurus!
data.about_the_game:
One night, at Just Another Museum, Tim The Time Machine decides he has had enough. After years of being put on display without his own exhibit, he figures it’s about time to get the recognition he deserves. He needs to destroy all the other exhibits to finally get his chance in the spotlight. But how exactly? Well, by kidnap- I mean recruiting a 67 million-year-old friend of course!
_x000D_
_x000D_ Play as Tony, the Tyrannosaurus Rex! Tony is lovable, hungry, cute, and eager to watch everything crash and burn. Bust and break your way through three fun-filled exhibits to score points, impress Tim, and make it back home! Sweep the competition with your tail swipe, chew up your enemies, and destroy priceless artifacts to show them whose boss!
_x000D_
_x000D_ Take a BITE out of the competition today!
_x000D_
_x000D_ This game was made by a group of students in the EAE program at the University of Utah as our capstone project. We just wanted to sincerely thank you for checking us out and we hope you have a dino-mite time playing!

data.name: The night of fire stealing 2/盗火之夜2
data.short_description: It's a difficult retro RPG game. No maps, no directions. Explore the dungeons as a team of four, moving freely through the maze and deftly dealing with various enemies. Fight the old gods in the eastern Tiantang city .
data.about_the_game:
The night of fire stealing 2

This game is the second work of The night of fire stealing series. This is a Retro RPG game. No maps, no directions. It tells the story of the encounter between the administrator and the old ones in the eastern TianTang City.

plot

The plot of this work is inherited from the previous work. In 2019, the player will play the protagonist Yan Yue and witness the contradiction between the administrator and the old gods from his perspective. This supposed peaceful modern city is facing a huge crisis
Together with the administrator to solve these crises, with the old ones of the universe to make an end.

game playing and operation

The round operation of 4-person team is adopted. By clicking on the ground with the mouse, the movement power is consumed to move in the maze. One attack or one use of props will consume all the movement power. The props of skills and equipment are released by using the specified keys on the keyboard

underground labyrinth

In the underground maze, you can't save outside the designated save point. If all the members of the team are killed, you will be judged dead. You can only read the previous archive and start over again. With the progress of the game, you can unlock more maps and more enemies

About some sensitive content

The game may contain some sensitive content, including minor pornography and violence. If you don't like the content, please don't buy the game

data.name: Nokta
data.short_description: Nokta is an online competitive FPS game that aims to give players fun and unique experience.
data.about_the_game: Nokta is a multiplayer competitive first person shooter with 6v6 team-based gameplay that has an unique style and it's planning to have various game modes and maps for players to enjoy. The game is in its early stages and it has an ambitious roadmap for its development cycle. With its stylistic design and solid gun mechanics, Nokta  aims to deliver enjoyable game experience.

data.name: SCORCH
data.short_description: SCORCH is a noir-inspired stealth, first-person shooter. Takedown thugs as you try to break away from your former life. Stalk the shadows, gather evidence, and get out of town. SCORCH is first and foremost a stealth game before it is a shooter.
data.about_the_game:
What is SCORCH?
SCORCH takes inspiration from the noir films of the 40s and 50s. Make your way through a black and white world, using the shadows to hide and take out the numerous thugs stalking the harbor around your home. Seek out the truth of their appearance in this stealth FPS shooter.

You are Morgan Hand...
Morgan Hand never thought about leaving the life of a hitman...until they met Mona. For the first time, they felt as though they could break away from that old life and start anew, but that involved cutting ties with the Giudice crime family. Now, it seems that an entire squad of assassins is after this retired gun. If Morgan wants to be free with Mona, they’re gonna have to do one last job.

Shadows and Lights
In the silent streets of this night-wrapped 1940’s city, it’s important to know how to take advantage of your surroundings. Use the shadows to hide, but be wary, as any number of hired guns could be lying in wait for you to walk into their trap. Counter this advantage by shining a light on the area, be it a flashlight or a muzzle flash. Search the docks for the leaders of this little hit, and show them why you don’t mess with Morgan Hand. Plus, who knows? Maybe they hold some answers to the true nature of this operation…

About SCORCH
- Stealth focused combat
- Collect evidence through Objectives
- Monochromatic art style
- Noir themes
- Original soundtrack
- Speedrunable

About Accidentally Games
Accidentally Games is a small dev team of undergraduate game development students. This game was made remotely while in our final semester, and we are greatly excited to bring it to Steam. Through many challenges, we are excited to bring our passion to you through this game.

Dave Crandall was a talented musician, sound engineer, and voice actor, as well as a wonderful friend. Without him, SCORCH would not have succeeded.
R.I.P. Dave, you will be missed.

data.name: Squeaky Clean
data.short_description: Psychological horror set in your favorite place: a nice hot shower.
data.about_the_game:
It's 2016, a string of murders across the United States has suddenly revived an old urban legend known as the "Shower Slasher" a mysterious figured associated with similar murders dating back generations.

Keep your ears open as you try to enjoy your otherwise relaxing shower and try to ignore the sensation you have that days seem to be repeating, that figures are darting around in your peripheral, and that unshakable feeling that you are being watched.

Ignore it.

Respond to your friends texts, let them know that nothing is wrong.
Envelope yourself in Steam and the tunes playing in your head.


Make yourself Squeaky Clean.

Squeaky Clean is a psychological horror game set entirely in the shower. Manage your cleanliness while strange ghost-like beings haunt you. Simple controls and quick but challenging levels ensure that Squeaky Clean can be played and feared by everyone

  • Experience the horror of your average shower!
  • Absorb hot shower tunes by Hoovobot
  • Watch the fate of five very clean shower-folk
  • Endure the challenge of survival!

Squeaky Clean is best enjoyed in a dark room with headphones and includes many jump scares, flashing lights, adult language, and occasional intense scenes.

data.name: Zombie Survival
data.short_description: ZS 온라인은 10분~16분 안의 짧은 시간 안에 즐길 수 있는 탑다운 2D 슈팅 멀티플레이 게임입니다. 밤만 되면 좀비가 나타나는 넓은 도시에서 아이템을 줍고, 조합하며 다른 플레이어들 중 가장 오래 생존하세요! 날이 갈수록 좀비의 종류가 늘어나고, 독가스가 도시를 덮쳐옵니다... 또는 인터넷 필요 없이 혼자서 낮에도 좀비가 나타나는 도시에서 독가스 없이 플레이할 수도 있습니다. 친구들, 또는 온라인의 플레이어들과 함께 가법게 즐기세요!
data.about_the_game:
ZS 온라인은 10분~16분 안의 짧은 시간 안에 즐길 수 있는 탑다운 2D 슈팅 멀티플레이 게임입니다. 낮 동안에 재료를 줍고, 원하는 무기와 아이템들을 만드세요! 밤이 되면 시야가 좁아지고 좀비들이 나옵니다. 하루가 지날 때마다 좀비의 종류가 늘어나고, 독가스가 도시를 덮쳐옵니다.



플레이어는 도시의 여러 건물들마다 흩어져 있는 재료들을 주울 수 있습니다.


나무를 캐서 나무와 과일을 얻을 수 있습니다.


지도에는 다른 플레이어의 위치가 보이며, 집 안에 들어가면 상대에게 보이지 않습니다.


허기는 점점 줄어들며, 빨리 움직일수록 더 빠르게 줄어듭니다. 허기가 0이 되면 체력이 줄어들고, 음식을 먹어 보충할 수 있습니다.







재료들을 조합해 칼이나 총 같은 무기나 투척용 도구, 방어구, 음식들을 만들 수 있습니다.


밤이 되면 어두워지고 시야가 제한되며, 좀비가 나옵니다. 또한 맵에서 다른 플레이어를 보지 못하게 됩니다.


날이 갈수록 좀비의 종류는 늘어나고, 독가스가 도시를 덮칩니다.


맵에 생존한 플레이어가 한 명밖에 남지 않게 되면 승리합니다.





여러 능력을 가진 캐릭터를 골라 플레이하세요.



인터넷 없이 혼자서 플레이할 수도 있습니다. 이 경우, 낮에도 좀비가 나오며, 더 많이 나옵니다. 또한 독가스가 도시를 덮치지 않고, 점수를 얻습니다.

data.name: Spaceship - Visual Effect Graph Demo
data.short_description: Spaceship is a small-scale technical demo showcasing high-end rendering of the Unity Game Engine. It presents a 5 minute long sequence of narrative first-person game play, You can also download the open-source project and open it using Unity Editor to learn how it was made.
data.about_the_game:
Spaceship is a short technical demo showcasing high-end visual effects of the Unity game engine.
_x000D_
_x000D_ You will play a 5-minute long first-person narrative sequence: While escaping an alien attack, your spaceship has warped into uncertain space and you need to find an escape route, before your pursuers catch up with you. Roaming into the spaceship, and Interacting with holographic terminals maps, you need to find a way to land into safe space... or is it already too late?
_x000D_
_x000D_ You can run the demo using different graphics quality levels and test some graphics features of Unity High Definition Render Pipeline. Also, we provide a benchmark mode that runs a simulation of the demo and reports simple results.
_x000D_
_x000D_ If you are interested on how the project was made, you can also download the full Unity project to learn, mod, reuse, or explore the content. It is available as open-source directly on GitHub.

data.name: Final Pilot
data.short_description: With easy-to-master controls, a simple objective, beautiful top-down 2D graphics and an 80’s arcade game spirit, FINAL PILOT is an online multiplayer battle royale set in the deepest reaches of uncharted space.
data.about_the_game:
With easy-to-master controls, a simple objective, beautiful top-down 2D graphics and an 80’s arcade game spirit, FINAL PILOT is an online multiplayer battle royale set in the deepest reaches of uncharted space.

Fun for the entire family and challenging enough for experienced players across the galaxy, begin your mission with a variety of customizable ship options then blast off into a fast-paced game of strategy, skill and blind luck with a singular objective in mind: SURVIVAL! Don’t just be the best…BEAT THE BEST (and look good doing it.)

Collect health by destroying asteroids!

Collect Buffs by destroying freighters!

Collect 3 Buffs and unlock the Tri-Blaster!



Pilots can use their starfighter’s onboard radar to locate asteroids and other in-game objects to get the edge on their opponents. Keep your wits and conserve your ammo as enemies lurk around every sector of this dangerous battleground! Then the ultimate challenge begins: “DOOM MODE”: the penultimate chapter in FINAL PILOT…where there are no do-overs and no coming back.

data.name: Fruit Hunter
data.short_description: Hungry for some fruit! Jump into missions and hunt for fruits running for their lives. Use your trusty bow and magic-wand-with-fork and capture them before they have the chance to escape. Travel to different environments and discover what fruit that resides in these unfamiliar and rough landscapes.
data.about_the_game:
Gameplay
Hunt for fruit with your bow and magic-wand-with-fork. Fruit will try and run away but you need to be quick enough to capture them. Collect enough fruit to fill your bowl and progress to the next mission.

Environments
Experience the 4 different regions, dark forest, plains, hot desert and rocky volcano. Traverse these landscapes in order to find the fruits that are hiding. Be cautious of the terrain as the different regions each have their own difficulties. Overcome your obstacles and ultimately fill all of your fruit bowls.

data.name: Last Blossom
data.short_description: The last Blossom it's a short game scene, based on tabletop roleplaying games. It presents some story, and it's up to you to choose how it will go. Dice rolls and their consequences, tough negotiations, turn-based combat, adventurous atmosphere, and, of course, some dancing lights!
data.about_the_game:
Last Blossom it's a short game scene, based on one well-known tabletop roleplaying game. I tried to reproduce the game rules with some accuracy, so it contains, if I may say, only a few "home rules". So this scene may help to understand some of the basic rules of roleplaying tabletop games.



If you are a lonely adventurer that standing on a crossroad with grey, boring and empty life on one way and creative, unbelievable and full of discoveries life of a roleplayer in another hand - i hope Last Blossom will help you to choose the right road.
And if you will not be quite inspired about all of this - just be sure that real roleplaying games with the right people are way better, so please don't give up!



This scene is pretty short, so if you don't want to have more spoilers - you may consider just to try it first. But if you need a features list, well...
Features:
  • Dice rolls - cruel but honest random and its deadly consequences!
  • Tense conversation
  • Turn-based battle
  • 3 playable characters
  • Different ways to achieve the goal
  • Fantasy adventure atmosphere, made of Low poly, patchy animation, 8-bit sounds, and Unreal Engine 4 features

I tried to put in this scene more or less full tutorial and detailed "Help" section, so if you are a beginner in this kind of genre, or maybe you not quite often playing in videogames at all - you still have a chance to figure out how it works.
If you will have some trouble in understanding of what's happening in the game, or what you need to do - i would be grateful if you let me know about you're problem.



OGL notice:
This game contains some of the Open Game Content that used under and in terms of Open Gaming License Version 1.0a.

data.name: Random Blacksmith Game
data.short_description: Jump into a fictionalized and dramatized medieval village as the village's blacksmith.
data.about_the_game:
Jump into a fictionalized and dramatized medieval village as the village's blacksmith. Craft weapons to sell to adventurers, go into the caves to mine for metals, live through wars and much more in this wacky medieval adventure!

Gameplay Tips
  • The more weapons you produce, the more adventures can clear the mines of goblins
  • Less goblins = more higher quality metals
  • Gather weapons from fallen soldiers during wars to sell in your store
  • Don't be scared of the goblins, be scared of going back to get your loot

data.name: SpaceTek
data.short_description: SPACE TEK, Command, Construct, Collect!Space Tek is an exciting free to play online starship combat game. Players build their dream ships out of a range of unique blocks, and tailor their ships. Then put the ships to the test alongside or against players and Ai in a multitude of gamemodes!
data.about_the_game:
Hey, are you feeling the need to blow some spaceships up? Want to send your opponents back to the dark ages? Do you like the thrill, in a team or alone?

SpaceTek is an exciting ship building and combat game inspired by Sci-Fi movies and series. The SpaceTek commanders mission will be to design and create a unique or inspired spaceship. Place turrets, Utilities, Shields and more on your ship to make yourself the most effective ship in the fleet. You will therefor need to destroy and gather enough Raw Metal components to buy new blocks ready to be used on your ship.

Gamemodes

Once you are ready to go, you will be able to choose from 2 gamemodes, whether that's team deathmatch or capture the ship is up to you. Team deathmatch game mode puts you head to head with another fleet of SpaceTek commanders, but be warned they could have defensive or weaponry blocks that could cause you serious damage. Your goal in team deathmatch is to destroy the enemies team relay station by doing so you stop there commanders from regenerating there ships.
Capture the ship game mode will again put you head to head with enemy SpaceTek commanders but your task is to bring back enough disabled ships by tractoring them towards your relay station. Which ever fleet collects the most disabled ships wins the battle.

Multiplayer

Play alone in a artificial fleet, or team up with players in Online matches bringing all the deadly abilities with you to eliminate the enemy fleet

Ship customisation

By using your collected Raw Metal components, gather blocks to build a ship ready to face the enemy fleet. There are a range of blocks to choose from such as turrets, Shields, Grappling hooks, Shield plating, core hull blocks and more. Try combine different blocks to see how much you can devastate your enemies.

data.name: Wonhon: the Beginning
data.short_description: 복수를 주제로 한 초자연적 잠입 액션 게임. 억울하게 죽은 소녀는 가족들을 다시 만나기 위해 저승사자와 거래를 합니다. 천당에서 가족들과 재회하는 대가로 다른 영혼들이 평온을 찾을 수 있도록 도와줘야 합니다.
data.about_the_game:
위시리스트에 정식판 추가.

저승에서 되돌아온 후 가진 무기는 오직 하나, 살아있는 존재에게서 생명력을 빼앗고, 귀신이 되어 산 자에게 빙의하는 것입니다. 아무런 보호 능력도 없고, 총탄 한 발에 죽을 수밖에 없기 때문에, 눈에 띄지 않게 움직이고 모든 움직임을 계획 하에 실행해야 합니다. 게임은 매우 복잡성이 높고, 붙잡히게 되면 단 한 발의 총탄에 사망하게 되기 때문에, 모든 행동을 신중하게 고려해야 합니다.



여러분은 원수를 암살하기 위해 복수심에 불타는 귀신으로 변하는 소녀가 되어 플레이하게 됩니다.



수적으로 열세에 몰리면 단 한 발의 총탄에도 사망할 수 있습니다. 기지를 발휘하여 까다로운 상황을 극복하세요.



모습을 숨기느냐 직접 행동에 나서 폭력을 사용하느냐 사이에서 균형을 잡으며 자신만의 고유한 임무 완수 방법을 찾아보세요.

data.name: If On A Winter's Night, Four Travelers
data.short_description: If On A Winter's Night, Four Travelers is a narrative-driven point-and-click adventure with horror elements that explores the stories of four characters in a masked ball taking place aboard a train in the late 1920s.
data.about_the_game:
Four strangers. A train. A masked ball. A tale of dark and troubling things in four acts.

THE SILENT ROOM

In a luxurious hotel room in Rome, freshly arrived from Turin, Carlo awaits for his lover Patrick to arrive. However, as the shadow of fascism looms ever larger, the tension of meeting in constant hiding is beginning to take its toll.

THE SLOW VANISHING OF LADY WINTERBOURNE

Lady Winterbourne has lost her husband in a tragic accident. Now letters from pretenders to her vast fortune keep arriving every day at her mansion, yet the only thing she's interested in is the bottle of laudanum in her cabinet.

THE NAMELESS RITUAL

Harassed, ridiculed and belittled by his peers, Dr. Jordan Samuels has resorted to the occult sciences in a desperate attempt to turn the tables on his tormentors. But is he truly ready to face the Guardian of the Threshold?

IF ON A WINTER'S NIGHT

As much as Laylah enjoys her job, sometimes she yearns for a bit of variety to distract her from her daily routine -- even if it means going against her very powerful bosses' orders.

Controls:


  • Left click = Walk / Talk / Look / Interact.
  • Right click = Cancel item action.
  • Esc = Pause / Options Menu.
  • Alt + Enter = Toggle fullscreen mode.
  • Alt + Ctrl = Toggle cursor lock when in windowed mode.

Brought to you by:



Laura Hunt: coding, writing, music, sound design.
Thomas Möhring: art, animations, cutscenes.

data.name: Carma
data.short_description: Out drive your friends in fast, arcade-style vehicle combat, using power-ups, killstreaks, and the environment to smash your foes! Battle across a miniature world, avoiding dangers and earning the gods favour to level up and unlock a wide range of customisables to help you stand out from the crowd.
data.about_the_game:
Out drive your friends in fast, arcade-style vehicle combat, using power-ups, killstreaks, and the environment to smash your foes! Battle across a miniature world, avoiding dangers and earning the gods favour to level up and unlock a wide range of customisables to help you stand out from the crowd.


Discover a diverse set of themed customisations for you to unlock through earning XP and favour from the gods of the universe. Spend favour on Toolboxes and test your luck to see what customisations you will hit the planets with.


Fast paced hectic combat awaits in Carma. Use a wide variety of offensive and defensive powerups to defeat your opponents and build up a killstreak. Hit kill milestones and unleash hectic killstreaks upon the game to twist the odds in your favour.


Take the fight to an extraordinary environment crafted by the gods. Bright popping colours and candied obstacles scattered across the planet can be used to your advantage, with routes handcrafted to allow you to dash around the planet quickly and make narrow escapes from danger.

data.name: Cyberplug
data.short_description: Cyberplug is a 2D platformer, where you control an electric being capable of moving at high speed and use electricity to advance through enemies and destroy a corporation that rules the cyberpunk themed city.
data.about_the_game:
In Cyberplug, you will run across the city clearing different levels, using the fast electric powers of the main character, in order to beat the F.R.O.G. Corporation that rules the city with a tight fist. These electric powers will be specially useful in the different settings such as the sewers or the suburbs where you will encounter different obstacles to beat at high speeds!


  • Frenetic Plataformer: Lateral movement based in the character's speed.
  • Movement skills: Beat different challenges with a variety of powers that will boost the speed.
  • Overcome threats: The corporation's robots will try to stop you, but you will be able to use them to obtain impulse and soar through the level.
  • Replayability: Once a level is finished, you will be able to come back to it and attempt to race beat your best time in a "shadow mode", or obtain the collectables you missed.


The comic hand drawn art style with contrasting colors, combined with the frenetic electric mechanics and gameplay, give the game a unique feeling within the cyberpunk theme.

data.name: SnOut
data.short_description: Compete for the top score in this combination of two classic arcade games!
data.about_the_game:
Compete for the top score in this combination of two classic arcade games!

The idea Is Simple

  • You control the snake
  • Gain length (and points) for the ball hitting your body
  • Body hits power up the ball to destroy blocks and create space
  • Just go for as long as you can!

You lose if your head hits the ball, the wall, or your own body!

  • Instant Action!
  • Easy-to-learn, Hard-to-master!
  • 16 colour palettes and 4 block styles to unlock!
  • Work your way up the online highscores (Monthly & All-Time)!
  • Supports the left-handed (swaps arrow keys for WASD)
  • Supports the left-handed AZERTY users (swaps WASD for QZSD)
  • Supports you as you sob gently after losing just before your previous high score

Available Completely Free!

data.name: Get Lost With Luke In Nature
data.short_description: Come and join Luke, and get lost in beautiful scenic locations, including gorges, rivers, mountains, canyons, beaches, and waterfalls in the United States and around the world.
data.about_the_game: America's East Coast is home to some of the most beautiful canyons, beaches, mountains, gorges, mountains, and rivers. It is especially famous during the Fall, when the leaves turn to impossibly beautiful shades of red, orange and yellow. This experience will allow you to visit some of these beautiful locations, hear a guided narration, and get up and even walk about a bit! At a time when travel, especially international travel, is so hard, we want to make you feel truly transported. We want you to feel the vitality, the rawness of these beautiful places in the same way you'd feel if you were visiting these places for the first time. New places will be added frequently, even extending outside the United States. Come and be part of this exciting journey with us!

data.name: House Builder: First Job
data.short_description: Become a one-man construction crew! Travel around the world and through the ages to build iconic designs! Beware unpleasant temperatures and dangerous fauna!
data.about_the_game:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1137750/Farmers_Life/

House Builder: First Job

We invite you to try out the prologue of House Builder! The released version includes as many as two complete, free levels for exploration! In this version of the game, you'll have to face hostile arctic temperatures and dangerous fauna in the middle of a tropical paradise. During this experience, you will learn the real methods of raising primitive structures. Get ready for an amazing journey!

Arctic

Find out how construction has been build in extremely low temperature. Survive night in the Arctic desolation.

Tropical Forest

Learn the ways of constructing shelter in tropical forest. See full process of preparing materials needed to raise neolithic shack.
Use special tools and stations to refine gathered materials. Discover and collect new skills fasting up building process.

Road to full version

In full release of the game, you will gain access to varied levels spanning multiple historical eras. Every level is unique and presents a different approach to building construction all over the world. From simple shacks to luxury modern villas.

data.name: Greedy Goblin
data.short_description: Greedy Goblin is a 3D "Looter Scooter!" LOOT gold and cursed artifacts to please the goblin king, and SCOOT past dangerous humans to solve puzzles and escape the ruins! Created by a University of Utah student developer team.
data.about_the_game:
GOBLIN KING HERE!

LISTEN UP MINIONS! Your job is to loot 'n scoot through the ruins and bring me a hoard of gold! But most importantly, you need to collect my CURSED ARTIFACTS! They should help you take care of those pesky humans while makin' the scootin part real easy..

Here's the plan...

LOOT


  • Loot cursed artifacts to get a taste of what its like to be me!
  • Loot gold... Because I told you so!

SCOOT


  • Scoot past those brainless humans.. If they make quick work of you, I can easily send a replacement..
  • Scoot through the ruins and make sure you use the artifacts to get more gold. HEY you listening to me kid?!

GET MOVING!

data.name: Gravity Snake
data.short_description: Gravity Snake is a 2D puzzle game that follows the adventures of a cute snake able to fold its body to squeeze through hard-to-reach areas. To complete a level, you need to collect all the apples scattered around it.
data.categories: 싱글 플레이어,Steam 도전 과제,컨트롤러 완벽 지원,Steam Cloud
data.about_the_game:
This game is a mix between the classic snake game and a platformer. The snake grows if you let him eat an apple. Unlike the classic snake game, you know from the old nokia phones, this snake has gravity.
_x000D_
_x000D_ In the game, you need to eat all the apples in 20 levels to find your lost love. The worm grows in size when it eats an apple. If at least one part of his body is not placed on any surface, he will fall.
_x000D_
_x000D_ Also, the worm cannot move in the opposite direction, so it can get entangled in its own body. Also in the game, there are elements that cannot be touched.

data.name: Psycho Bathroom
data.short_description: Psycho Bathroom is a boss rush game with a dark comedic storyline about outcasts, hopes and friendships. Your job as a toothbrush is to fight toilet plumes and protect your master. Along the way, you'll upgrade your gear, meet new buddies and learn the absurd world through your master's story.
data.categories: 싱글 플레이어,Steam 도전 과제,컨트롤러 완벽 지원,Steam Cloud
data.about_the_game:
More reviews:


"PB is an entertaining and very well put together game. I enjoyed the mechanics of this fighter and the story is one I believe should be heard."
- The Paladin Club (Steam Curator)

“I love the story so far it's cute but also really tragic and relatable”
- Mayshing, founder of Altabe Studio

"Wasn't sure what I was getting myself in for with this one but it's great! It's a platformer that's all boss fights and quirky toilet humour. My only complaint? Needs to be longer! Should not be free."
- CSH Picone (Steam Curator)

"Worthwhile lessons about bathroom hygiene form the backbone of this fun, toilet-themed boss rush game with a surprisingly sweet story. Satisfying combat, good variety and challenge await."
- indie recommendations (Steam Curator)

"Psycho Bathroom is great, with a sense of humour added to it. as you take on a variety of boss fights which enhances your experience with a story that makes you feel more immersive within the game."
- Weird F'n Games (Steam Curator)

"A sentient toothbrush fighting against poop-based monsters to save the hygiene of his master, in a bizarre and addictive 2D action boss-rush with VN elements and quotes from scientific journals."
- Crazy Bloody Action Games (Steam Curator)

"It is fast, fluid and addictive; it is all made better by the fact that the game is free. Not free-to-play; free for life, like there are no extra costs, which surprised me because combat is robust."
- Syndicate Y (Gaming media site)

A boss rush game with a dark comedic storyline about outcasts, hopes and friendships.


In the bathroom you reside in, your toilet lid is broken. Every toilet flush is splashing aerosols all over the place. You, as a toothbrush, must eradicate the threat and protect your master. Along the way, you'll upgrade your gear, meet new buddies and learn the absurd world through your master's story.

Swift combats


Toothpaste is your sword, and mouthwash is your holy water.

Slash the filthy enemies in their faces, attack them from below, hit and bounce on their heads (homage to Hollow Knight!) Perform combo streaks to activate your mouthwash for critical hits and speed buff.



Unlock new skills, buy gear and upgrades


Win the battle and keep your master clean. In return, your healthy master will work hard and split his earnings with you. Use it to buy equipment, upgrade and unlock new abilities. If you want, get a new toilet lid to stop the filth from coming out once and for all (or not?).

Friends With Unique Abilities


Along the way, you will meet new friends who will assist you in your battles. Put their unique abilities to good use!

A black comedy about outcasts, hopes and friendships


Chat heart to heart with your master during the tooth-brushing session after every battle. Explore his bitter-sweet story - well, sweet only if you can beat the game. Otherwise, it’d just be a bitter story.

Unlimited Levels


There’re 12 unique bosses. Every time you've beaten all of them, they will make a comeback. They will get stronger and probably with evolving move-sets. Your previous tactics may no longer work.

How Long To Beat


It takes around 1- 1.5 hours to see the ending of the story. But the real fun starts after you’ve beaten the game!

Game Features


  • Information about real-life toilet plumes.
  • Tight control allows you to move around and strike swiftly.
  • 12 bosses and numerous minions.
  • Shop - buy equipment, upgrades, unlock new abilities.
  • Unlimited levels with increasing difficulty.
  • A dark but comic story.
  • 4 dumbfounding animated cutscenes.

data.name: Green Fairy VR
data.short_description: Follow the Green Fairy’s adventure as she learns to appreciate her unique green glow by finding refuge at the traffic lights in the Big Little City.
data.about_the_game:
Starring Maya Tuttle, Jorjeana Marie and Alejandra Reynoso, The Green Fairy VR is a VR animated short, the first installment into The Green Fairy series. It explores the origins of the Green Fairy and how she came to find her home. Follow the green fairy as she embarks on a journey from the forest deep inside mountains, and down to the city below.

This short is intended for all ages, immerse yourself in an engaging story full of fun loving characters, beautiful environments and an original music score that will leave you feeling warm.

Created by CONICAL Studios in New Zealand.

data.name: Dice Of Knights
data.short_description: Roll the dice, swing the sword and let the magic talk!
data.categories: 멀티플레이어,PvP,스크린 공유 및 분할 PvP,협동,스크린 공유 및 분할 협동,공유/분할 화면,컨트롤러 일부 지원,Remote Play Together
data.about_the_game:
Roll the dice, swing the sword and let the magic talk!

Dice of Knights is a turn based battle game where everything depends on luck and magic.
Gather your friends in your home or use Steam Remote Play and fight each other in this 7x7 doomed world.

Build and destroy towers to reshape the world.
Attack other players with your allmighty dice and use magic effects at the right moment to be the last knight standing.

Good luck, knight. We believe in luck and you should believe, too.
Because only luck can guide you through this merciless battle.



Need friends to play? Join our Discord server, maybe you can find friends.
Check right menu bar to join.

Collectibles

Spikes

data.name: Brisk Square
data.short_description: Future! In the wake of a cataclysm! You are the prey in a world full of hunters. Run, overpower them and free the violent streets in this intensively fast-paced cyber adventure. Be the last stand in an infinite run gameplay by starting with a simple blade and evolve to unlock more advanced weapons.
data.about_the_game:
Future! In the wake of a cataclysm! You are the prey in a world full of hunters. Run, overpower them and free the violent streets in this intensively fast-paced cyber adventure.



Be the decisive last stand in an infinite run gameplay by starting with a simple blade and evolve step by step to unlock more advanced weapons.



Make your way ahead in the game by sword-slashing with your one hand and use superior powers to push/pull/crash objects with your other one and collect enough points to reach the top of a worldwide leaderboard.

data.name: Super Nova Stadium
data.short_description: Join other alien contestants in a ricochet battle at the Super Nova Stadium! Chose your blaster, harness solar power to charge your weaponry and knock our your opponents to claim victory! Compete as a team in two game modes: Standoff or Overcharge in intense, ricocheting combat.
data.about_the_game: Super Nova Stadium is a first person shooter where to aim of the game is ricochet your shots to deal increased damage to your opponents. This alien sporting contest takes place in a solar-punk world where light and solar energy control everything. Players have the choice of several blasters with different properties such as the number of ricochets and the damage they deal per ricochet. Utilize map geometry around you to create clever reflection angles to maximize the damage you deal to your opponents.

data.name: Tiny Heroes 2
data.short_description: Tiny Heroes 2 is a unique turn-based RPG. Recruit, train and lead a team of heroes to fight evil in an innovative turn-based combat system.
data.categories: 싱글 플레이어,Steam 도전 과제,앱 내 구매
data.about_the_game:
In Midgard, you were once a Guardian Angel, but you were deprived of abilities and sent to the mortal world after being used by the Devil King to usher in the invasion of the Dark Legion. And now, Elf Noam is looking everywhere for you…

Features

1.Turn-Based Combat
Simple operation: smooth and effortless drags.

2.Squad
Create assortments of squads by matching up heroes and pets of different classes.

3.Avatar System
Each gear has a different design and displays a different self.

4.Deliberation & Decision
In each round, clever strategies can give the fullest play to powerful spells.

5.Growth & Collection
During growth, collect heroes, pets, gears and materials.

6.Crafting Gears
Collect materials to craft gears and obtain even more powerful star gears.

data.name: Slow and Steady

data.name: Mauled
data.short_description: Mauled is a Free To Play, Third Person Shooter, CO-OP online, with procedural generated levels, infinite hordes of fierce creatures and many weapons to buy in citadels. Ah, it's free and I developed it entirely on my own :D
data.about_the_game:
Mauled is a Free To Play, Third Person Shooter, CO-OP online, with procedural generated levels, infinite hordes of fierce creatures and many weapons to buy in citadels. It can be played in online co-op, provided you can find some poor people playing it. Ah, it's free and I developed it entirely on my own (maybe I should have said that on release day), so be kind with the reviews, I'm just a poor guy trying to make something fun. Any tips on how to improve it you can share on the Discord channel :) (https://discord.gg/umYn6J56bz)

The aim of the game is to survive the waves of monsters that will come out of the portals.
Each map is procedurally generated, so the levels will be different from the previous game (or so I tried to develop it).
At the end of each round, gates will open to enter the citadel.
Citadels are places where you can buy weapons or upgrades from merchants or regenerate your health from the doctor.
Weapons are divided into 4 classes (common, rare, epic and legendary). There is one type of merchant for each type of weapon.
Oh forgot, every now and then a boss comes and wants to kill you.

Every game developed by Elements Studio was created by one person, me! I am a lone developer, a nerd who loves to create video games in his spare time. I am an amateur so don't expect triple-A games. I use Unreal Engine to develop games, and I don't have a team, so before you write a bad review about the game, please think that there is just a poor guy behind it trying to do his best. If you feel like supporting my games financially you can buy me a coffee :D

PS: Before you may think that I am a greedy person solely looking for money (which may also be true), Buying me a coffe can be a great way to help me fund games through new assets, plugins and various technologies.

I opened the channels a few days ago so there are only a few of us (me, myself and the other me). If you want to join, give me some advice or just have a chat, well you can find me here :)

- Discord Invite https://discord.gg/umYn6J56bz
- Site https://elements-studios.netlify.app/
- Buy me a coffe https://www.buymeacoffee.com/elementsgames

data.name: Life On A Pizza
data.short_description: 당신은 더 이상 먹는 사람이 아닙니다. 당신은 먹었습니다. 배고픈 괴물 턱이 당신과 당신을 맛있는 죽음으로 몰아가는 개미에게서 피자를 먹고 살아 남기 위해 토핑으로 플레이하세요. 피자의 색상과 모양을 맞춤 설정하고 게임 모드와 좋아하는 토핑을 선택한 다음이 히스테리 한 파티 또는 솔로 게임에 참여하세요.
data.categories: 싱글 플레이어,멀티플레이어,PvP,스크린 공유 및 분할 PvP,협동,스크린 공유 및 분할 협동,공유/분할 화면,플랫폼간 멀티플레이어,Steam 도전 과제,컨트롤러 일부 지원,Steam Cloud,TV용 Remote Play,Remote Play Together
data.about_the_game:
로컬 멀티 플레이어 또는 혼자 플레이
파티를위한 완벽한 게임 (최대 4 인)과 혼자 플레이하기에 완벽한 게임입니다. 재미는 영향을받지 않습니다!

손쉬운 플레이, 마스터하기 어려움
가장 간단한 컨트롤. 왼쪽, 오른쪽, 위, 아래. 고전적인 "플레이하기 쉽고 마스터하기 어렵다"의 좋은 예입니다. 속담. 또한 키보드 또는 컨트롤러로 매우 쉽게 연주 할 수 있습니다.

대립 또는 협력
친구 또는 다른 플레이어와 함께 또는 대항하여 생존하십시오! 각각은 완전히 다른 경험입니다.

피자 커스터마이즈
선택할 수있는 다양한 색상과 모양은 기괴한 피자를 플레이 할 수있는 옵션을 제공합니다!

다양한 게임 모드
지루해 졌어? 다른 게임 모드로 전환하십시오. 문제 해결됨.

모든 것을 멋지게 꾸밀 수있는 파워 업
여분의 치즈로 생각하십시오. 추가 비용이 없습니다.

업데이트 = 더 많은 콘텐츠
더 많은 토핑, 더 많은 게임 모드, 더 많은 사용자 정의 옵션, 더 많은 파워 업, 더 많은 재미. 업데이트가 더욱 혼란스러운 흥미 진진한 콘텐츠를 가져올 것이라는 것은 말할 필요도 없습니다.

누군가와 함께 플레이하고 싶으신가요?
커뮤니티 서버에 가입하고 지정된 채널에서 메시지를 보내세요.

data.name: Who Are You?
data.short_description: A girl had done the unthinkable, taken her own life. You travel through the key moments of her life that have lead her to take her own life. But only after she travels through all these important moments of her life again does she realize she had made a huge mistake.
data.about_the_game:
Who Are You? is an open world, narrative game set in limbo, moments after she has taken her own life.
_x000D_
_x000D_ Walkthrough all of the key moments that had let her into taking her own life. But only after she travels through these moments for the second time in limbo she comes to the realization that she has made a mistake in doing so.
_x000D_
_x000D_ KEY FEATURES
_x000D_ *A compelling story that will pull on your heartstring and make you feel for the action of action she has taken.
_x000D_ *A really beautiful-looking world with tons of amazing colors.

About

Riding Shotgun is a micro party game where one person controls movement of the player while another person controls the shooting of the gun.

Features

data.name: Mainframe Defenders: Meltdown - Prologue
data.short_description: 메인프레임 수비대: 멜트다운 - 프롤로그는 흥미로운 아이템과 커스터마이징에 중점을 두는 턴제 전략 게임 "메인프레임 수비대"의 무료 버전입니다. 업그레이드를 조합하고 전리품을 획득하여 스타게이저 단지를 지키세요.
data.about_the_game:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1184810

메인프레임 수비대: 멜트다운 - 프롤로그는 복고미래주의 감성의 전략 게임 "메인프레임 수비대"의 무료 데모 버전입니다. 4기의 프로토타입으로 이루어진 부대를 지휘하며 미지의 바이러스로부터 메인프레임을 보호하세요. 단지의 가장 깊숙한 곳으로 진입하며 적의 공격을 물리치고, 제조기를 파괴하고, 귀중한 데이터를 다운로드하고, 감염된 노드를 확보하는 등 다양한 임무를 수행해야 합니다. 아이템의 제한 사항과 단점을 우회하고 강력한 조합을 만드세요. 과열시키고, 부식으로 파괴하고, 피해를 흡수하고, 반격하는 등 다양한 전술로 상대를 파괴하세요. 하지만 적에게 대처법이 있을지도 모르니 한 전략에만 의존해서는 안 됩니다. 프롤로그 콘텐츠:

  • 로봇 24기 중 6기.
  • 아이템 190개 중 90개.
  • 임무 1/3 (1장).



* 레트로 스타일: 80년대 PC 단말기에서 영감을 받은 그래픽과 세련된 신스웨이브 음악의 만남.

* 다양한 전술: 이 게임은 다양한 전략을 사용할 수 있도록 제작되었습니다. 적 로봇을 과열로 파괴하든, 산더미 같은 총알로 파묻어 버리든, 강력한 단발 공격으로 처치하든, 디버프로 뒤덮어 무용지물로 만들어버리든 원하는 대로 플레이하세요!

* 자신의 부대를 꾸리세요: 카드 게임에서 덱을 구성하는 것과 유사하게, "메인프레임 수비대"에서는 독특한 효과를 지닌 다양한 아이템을 조합하여 무적의 부대를 구성할 수 있습니다. 아이템의 결점을 상쇄하거나, 그냥 무시하여 단점이 있지만 강력한 빌드를 만드세요!

* 독특한 적: 이 게임의 적들은 가만히 앉아 당신이 공격하기를 기다리지 않을 것입니다. 부대의 유닛마다 제각기 역할이 존재하며, 특정한 전략에 유리하도록 설계되었습니다. 목표를 신중하게 고르지 않으면 분명 패배하게 될 것입니다.

* 절차적 레벨: 이 게임은 직접 설계한 방들과 절차적 생성 방식을 조합하여 무작위 레벨을 만듭니다. 임무에는 다양한 목표와 독특한 임무 조건들이 존재합니다. 도전에 맞서실 건가요, 아니면 뒤쳐지는 것을 감수하고 미지의 위협을 피하실 건가요?

* 진행 시스템: 이 게임의 향방은 한 전투의 결과로 결정되지 않습니다! 저마다 독특한 업그레이드와 장비를 사용하는 신규 유닛을 잠금 해제하세요. 새로운 전략에 맞는 새 아이템을 잠금 해제하세요. 스타게이저 사건의 퍼즐 조각을 맞춰가며 진상을 파악하세요.



Synthetic Domain은 게임 제작이라는 취미에 열정을 가진 이들이 모여 만든 소규모 팀입니다. 저희는 완성도에 중점을 두며 한정된 자원으로 품질 좋은 게임을 제작하기 위해 노력하고 있습니다. 인디 게임과 90년대 및 00년대 게임에서 영감을 얻으며, 그 시대의 정신을 현대에서 재현하고자 합니다.

Meltdown은 단순한 추가 기능이 아니라 많은 흥미로운 수정 사항을 본 모든 플레이어의 사랑입니다. 물론, 우리의 결점들도 있습니다. 수정 및 추가 된 내용의 전체 목록은 다음에서 찾을 수 있습니다: Meltdown v1.3

문제를 겪고 있거나, 후기 혹은 건의 사항이 있으시다면 언제든 주저하지 말고 연락 주세요. Synthetic Domain


https://store.steampowered.com/app/1184810

data.name: Dawn of Light
data.short_description: After thousands of years of dormancy, embody darkness and crush any resistance that arises in front of you with the help of your primordial powers in this first person shooter.
data.about_the_game:
Student game of the outgoing promotion of objectif 3D. Dawn of Light is a first person shooter, the protagonist is the deity of darkness who, after centuries wakes up in an unrecognizable desert world. Many enemies will try to block your way and send you back to your sleep... permanently.
_x000D_
_x000D_ Discover what woke you up. Climb the obstacles and collect your powers to destroy any mortal who dares to stand in your way.
_x000D_ Collect their souls after destroying their physical bodies to fuel your powers. Embody the evil necessary to save this ruined world.

data.name: Wild Dive
data.short_description: Reach the highest score by dodging obstacles, leaping across ravines, sliding down slopes, etc ... Watch your step!
data.about_the_game:
On a small unknown island in the middle of the ocean, you play as WEASLEY, a young ferret raised by a tribe of wild birds
_x000D_ A big day has arrived, the rite of passage! Every birdling needs to show they can fly!
_x000D_ But for you, the flight might not be as pleasant...
_x000D_ Are you ready for the Wild Dive?
_x000D_
_x000D_ Wild Dive is a First Person Runner made for PC, where you cross a vibrant but unforgiving nature at a frantic pace. Reach the highest score by dodging obstacles, leaping across ravines, sliding down slopes, etc ...
_x000D_ Watch your step!

data.name: DERE EXE: Rebirth of Horror
data.short_description: Experience the terrifying first chapter in a series of platformer horror games.
data.about_the_game:
'DERE EXE: Rebirth of Horror' is an immersive narrative horror-thriller using the interface of a normal puzzle platformer game with difficult obstacles and surprises.

'DERE EXE: Rebirth of Horror' is the terrifying chapter that precedes the events of the critically acclaimed DERE EVIL EXE. With retro pixel art visuals, atmospheric music, and a surreal horror story that makes it a creepypasta come to life, the first major entry in the AppSir Games series delivers an unparalleled experience for newcomers to the franchise.

This game is not for the faint of heart. You were warned.

data.name: Tower Ball - Incremental Tower Defense
data.short_description: 포탑을 건설해 공을 파괴하고, 돈을 벌고, 그 돈을 업그레이드에 사용해 더 강력해지세요.
data.categories: 싱글 플레이어,Steam 도전 과제,앱 내 구매
data.about_the_game:
탑을 건설해 떨어지는 공을 파괴하세요! 돈과 명성 포인트를 적립해 탑을 업그레이드하세요! 게임을 진행하며 새로운 레벨과 새로운 탑을 해제하세요.

7가지 독특한 탑 건설하기
총 포탑 - 큰 피해를 입히는 총알을 하나씩 쏨
폭탄 탑 - 폭탄이 타깃에 부딪혀 광역 스플래시 피해를 입힘
수축 광선 - 지속적인 DPS 피해를 가하는 레이저를 쏨
전기 탑 - 여러 대상으로 튕겨 나가는 전기 구를 쏨
산성 슈터 - 독극물 피해를 입히고 넓은 구역의 공을 수축시키는 산을 쏨
자석 - 모든 공을 끌어당겨 콤보에 큰 도움이 됨
톱날 - 접촉 시 근접 피해를 입히는 파쇄 공

포탑은 떨어지는 공을 쏘고, 공이 파괴될 때마다 돈을 법니다. 포탑을 해제하고, 업그레이드하고, 건설해 더 빠르게 돈을 버세요!


--------------------------------------------
타워 공 - 특징
--------------------------------------------
• 약하게 시작해도 점차 파워 업과 함께 레벨이 오르며 강해집니다!
• 각자 고유한 능력이 있는 7가지 독특한 포탑 건설
• 명성으로 처음부터 더욱 특별한 파워 업과 함께 시작
• 탑은 자동으로 공을 쏘고, 방치 상태에서도 돈을 벌 수 있습니다!
• 점점 정복하기 어려워지는 8가지 레벨. 난이도가 높은 레벨은 더 많은 돈과 보석을 제공합니다
• 돈을 써서 방어진을 업그레이드하고 더 크게 파괴해 보세요
• 보석을 획득해 모든 포탑에 영향을 주는 글로벌 업그레이드를 해제하세요

점진적 타워 방어
처음부터 방어진을 쌓아 보세요! 약하게 시작해도 레벨이 오르면서 기하급수적으로 강해집니다.
파워 업을 위한 명성
명성 버튼을 눌러 더 많은 돈, 그리고 업그레이드와 함께 게임을 다시 시작하세요! 명성 포인트가 올라갈수록 강해지며 새로운 게임도 전보다 나아집니다.
전략이 있는 방치형 클리커 게임
전략을 이용해 완벽한 방어진을 배치하고 수익을 극대화하세요. 무엇이 효율적인지 실험해 보세요!

지금 무료로 게임을 즐기세요!

data.name: Zombie Gunship Survival
data.short_description: 대재앙이 지나갔습니다. 우리에게 남은 것은 살아남으려는 의지, 끝없이 밀려오는 좀비 무리, 그리고 그들을 모두 산산조각으로 만들어 버리기에 충분한 총알들 뿐입니다.
data.categories: 싱글 플레이어,앱 내 구매,컨트롤러 일부 지원
data.about_the_game:
공군병 여러분은 지구에 얼마 안 남은 인간 중 한 명입니다. AC-130 건십을 타고 병력을 언데드로부터 보호해주세요. 좀비를 날려 버리고 전우들을 승리로 이끄세요.
언데드를 죽여서 인류를 수호하세요!

하늘에서 총알의 비를 퍼부으세요


언데드가 돌연변이를 일으켜 무시무시한 괴물로 변했습니다. 공군병으로서 여러분은 다양한 무기를 사용하여 좀비들에게 대처해야 합니다. 현실적인 무기를 수집하고 무기들의 출력을 증가시켜서 하늘에서부터 적을 초토화하세요.

현실적인 무기를 수집하세요


여러분의 작전 기지는 생존자들의 피난처입니다. 기지가 끝없이 몰려드는 좀비들의 공세에 버텨내려면 건물과 방어 시설을 업그레이드해야 할 겁니다. 타워와 벽으로 좀비들을 저지한 다음 하늘에서 총알의 비를 퍼부으세요.

기지를 업그레이드하세요



게임 요소:
  • 공중 지원을 제공하여 좀비 떼와 싸우는 병력을 보호하세요. 병력을 배치하기 전에 임무를 면밀히 계획하여 효율적으로 싸우세요.
  • 다양한 종류의 병력 중에서 임무에 적합한 병력을 선택하세요: 어썰트, 정찰대, 폭파반, 스나이퍼
  • AC-130 건십에서 적외선 야시경을 통해 적을 감시하고 1인칭 슈터식 전투 시나리오를 플레이하세요.
  • 다양한 능력을 지닌 좀비들이 병력을 위협합니다. 거대한 타이탄부터 파괴적인 레커까지, 이 돌연변이 괴물들은 병력의 생존에 큰 위협이 됩니다.
  • 골드와 그 외의 보상을 수집하여 피난처의 방어 시설을 보충하세요. 타워, 바리케이드, 무기를 업그레이드하여 기지를 언데드로부터 보호하세요.
  • 주간 이벤트에서 경쟁하여 전설 보상을 획득하세요!
  • 활발히 돌아가는 커뮤니티에서 다른 사람들과 함께 플레이하세요. 친구들과 슈터 게임 전략을 논의해 보세요.

data.name: Bean
data.short_description: Bean is a completely satire single player first person parkour game. Use WASD keys to walk. You can grapple using your burger onto the orange blocks using left click. You are the red bean trying to get to the other 5 beans.
data.about_the_game: Bean is a completely satire single player first person parkour game. To move onto a new level, collect the gold orb and it will teleport you to the next level. Use WASD keys to walk. You can grapple using your burger onto the orange blocks using left click. You can go back to any level after you completed all levels. You are the red bean trying to get to the other 5 beans.

data.name: Frog Fighters
data.short_description: Frog Fighters is a light-hearted, fast-paced, third-person-shooter where you become a frog on a lily pad with an ability to shoot other flying frogs with different types of laser-leafs.
data.categories: 싱글 플레이어,멀티플레이어,PvP,온라인 PvP,Steam 도전 과제,컨트롤러 완벽 지원,앱 내 구매,통계
data.about_the_game:
Frog Fighters is a light-hearted, fast-paced, third-person-shooter where you become a frog on a flying lily pad with an ability to shoot other flying frogs with different types of laser-leafs.

Secondary Abilities:
Charged Blast - Hold down your secondary fire key to build up a big leaf ball. The longer you build up, the bigger the damage.
Shotgun - Release a bunch of low-damage, high-spread leaf pellets. Extremely deadly at close range.
Healing Beam - Hold down secondary fire key to emit a beam that heals teammates within its path.

Passive Abilities:
Armor - Extra protection that may allow you to survive otherwise deadly shots.
Speed - Max speed is slightly increased to allow you to outmaneuver your opponents.
Health Regeneration - Regenerate Health when not in combat for a set amount of time.

Game Modes:
Free For All - Every frog for themselves. First to 30 or the frog with the highest score after 5 minutes wins.
Team Death Match - Frogs are split into 2 teams. First team to 100 or the team with the highest score after 5 minutes wins.
Last Man Standing - Be the last Frog in the arena in a intense, quick, fast-paced battle-royale.

data.name: Through Rust We Are Returned
data.short_description: Explore the Manchester-Liverpool district as Angel, a former soldier with missing memories about her shrouded past. Battle homunculi gone mad during the chaos of a rising rebellion to uncover the secrets hidden deep within the mainframe.
data.about_the_game:
Fight Your Way Through The City

Play as Angel, a former soldier who has lost her memories and her purpose as she navigates turbulence in the Manchester-Liverpool District. Unfortunately trouble is coming her way. Confront the rebellion which seeks to take down the mainframe and investigate a virus turning homunculi violent.



Unlock New Memories

Uncover Angel’s mysterious past to unlock new powers. Utilize forgotten memories in battle against fearsome enemies and deadly threats. Each memory provides new information allowing Angel to piece together her past and discover the hidden truths of the conflict raging around her.



Meet New Friends... Or Enemies

Expand Angel’s party along the way with new allies, each with their own complicated past and unique abilities. However, as support grows so shall resistance and everything may not be as it seems. Dive into the mysteries surrounding the past and future of Angel.



Through Rust We Are Returned Overview

  • A turn based strategy game with a unique memory map system that will reveal key narrative points and new combat abilities as Angel remembers her past to investigate what is happening in the Manchester-Liverpool District.
  • Angel combats enemies in a grid based system facing new threats and gaining new party members as she progresses.
  • Visually, the game delivers a victorian-cyberpunk style with gothic architecture.
  • Play with keyboard and mouse on windows.
  • Created by Chaos Crew Productions, a senior student team graduating May 2021.
Thanks for playing!

data.name: Kamu's Offering
data.short_description: Kamu's Offering is a challenging sidescroller platformer with the uniqueness of controlling two entities, the priest that can jump, move, throw and catch, and Kamu's essence that's thrown by the priest and bounces throght the scenery. You have to combine the two to platform your way through Africa!
data.about_the_game:
In the depth of the African Desert, God Kamu's heart is broken, as he moved away from his loved one in order to protect his people. As a dying wish, Kamu tasks you, his brave priest, his final command. Find all his heart parts and deliver them in one piece to the only one whodeserves it, his loved one.

You will have to get through the toughest deserts, caves, climb the tallest mountains and escape the deepest jungles to get to the three temples where Kamu stopped on his path to save his people.

In this platformer, you are equiped with Kamu's essence, a sphere that will help you overcome any type of platforming obstacle that will evolve with new unique behaviours.

- Jump, throw, catch and bounce in many interesting and unique ways during the 10 big levels the game provides].

- Kamu's Offering is a challenging platformer that tries to balance difficulty with the unique mechanic of platforming.

- 2D and 3D artstyle that try to represent a not to shown part of Africa, the subsaharan west and it's tribes and cultures, fictionalized.

data.name: Super Raft Boat VR
data.short_description: A VR rogue-lite shooter where you must survive waves of sea creatures while building your Super Raft Boat. Can you reach the Final Island?
data.categories: 싱글 플레이어,Steam 도전 과제,추적되는 컨트롤러 지원,VR 전용,Steam Cloud,Steam 순위표
data.about_the_game:
The world has been flooded, and all you have is your trusty revolver and a small raft. All you can do is sail and hope to survive the onslaught of sea creatures trying to eat you. Traverse Clear Skies to the Sea of the Damned, and try your best to reach the Final Island!

A VR adaptation of Shattered Journal Games' Super Raft Boat.

  • Build & expand your raft to gain an advantage over hoards of enemies.
  • Elite enemies make your fight more treacherous the longer you go.
  • 4 different environments with their own foes.
  • 3 unlockable weapons to add to your arsenal.
  • Looping for those who want to push their chances.
  • Compete in daily leaderboards to see who's the best in the world.

data.name: GashiShachiNoSachi
data.short_description: Virtual Internet
data.about_the_game:
This game is browsing the internet for pages that don't exist, starting with the mysterious homepage "餓史シャチの幸(GashiShachiNoSachi)".
_x000D_
_x000D_ When you start the game, you will see a screen that looks like an operating system with sound effects. First, try logging in and launching your browser.
_x000D_ Browsers come with back, forward, refresh, and home buttons that are useful for browsing.
_x000D_ You can jump directly to a page by entering the URL in the address field and clicking the Go button.
_x000D_
_x000D_ On some pages, objects can be got by clicking on them.
_x000D_ The object you get will be displayed in the eyedropper field of the browser.
_x000D_ The object can be attached to a some object, and if the content of the attachment is correct, an event will occur.
_x000D_ When the event occurs, you can go to another link.
_x000D_
_x000D_ Enjoy surfing the net.
_x000D_
_x000D_ : The screen size is only 1024*768 window.
